pr_title: Issue #4650 - do not use ServiceLoader every time a WSSession is started

timeline.message:
Issue #4650 - do not use ServiceLoader every time a WSSession is started

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

timeline.bodyText: Is this running under the correct Classloader / Thread Context?
timeline.author: joakime

replies.bodyText: Yes, its running on the same thread and with the same contextClassLoader it has for doStart().
replies.author: lachlan-roberts
